title: Fix #849 : function ToSKPixmap create display artifacts with transparent bitmaps

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for this PR - merging as soon as the build finishes.

comments.author: mlaily
comments.body:
Hello !

Is there an estimation of when this fix will be available through nuget?

(And is there some kind of roadmap or public document where information about planned releases can be found? https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/projects/22 does not seem up to date, but I might be mistaken)

comments.author: mattleibow
